code: import axios from"axios";import{baseURL}from"../App";import{actionType}from"./actionType";export var fetchArticle=function fetchArticle(){return function(dp){axios.get("".concat(baseURL,"v1/api/articles?page=1&limit=15")).then(function(res){dp({type:actionType.fetch_article,payLoad:res.data.DATA});});};};export var searchArticle=function searchArticle(title){return function(dp){axios.get("".concat(baseURL,"v1/api/articles?title=").concat(title)).then(function(res){dp({type:actionType.search_article,payLoad:res.data.DATA});});};};export var deleteArticle=function deleteArticle(id){return function(dp){axios.delete("".concat(baseURL,"v1/api/articles/").concat(id)).then(function(res){dp({type:actionType.delete_article,payLoad:id});});};};
